name: schuur
description: Relational data management for node and the browser

scripts.build: BABEL_ENV=production ./node_modules/.bin/browserify index.js -o dist/schuur.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] && ./node_modules/.bin/browserify index.js -o dist/schuur.min.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 babili ] ]
scripts.prepublish: BABEL_ENV=production ./node_modules/.bin/browserify index.js -o dist/schuur.min.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 babili ] ]
